tool.name: FeatureFinderMRM
tool.description: Detects two-dimensional features in LC-MS data.
tool.command:
FeatureFinderMRM
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $param_algorithm_min_rt_distance: -algorithm:min_rt_distance $param_algorithm_min_rt_distance #end if #if $param_algorithm_min_signal_to_noise_ratio: -algorithm:min_signal_to_noise_ratio $param_algorithm_min_signal_to_noise_ratio #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_min_num_peaks_per_feature: -algorithm:min_num_peaks_per_feature $adv_opts.param_algorithm_min_num_peaks_per_feature #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_write_debug_files: -algorithm:write_debug_files #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_resample_traces: -algorithm:resample_traces #end if #if $adv_opts.param_algorithm_write_debuginfo: -algorithm:write_debuginfo #end if #end if

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_algorithm_min_rt_distance
param.label: Minimal distance of MRM features in seconds

param.name: param_algorithm_min_signal_to_noise_ratio
param.label: Minimal S/N ratio a peak must have to be taken into account
param.help: (-min_signal_to_noise_ratio) Set to zero if the MRM-traces contains mostly signals, and no noise

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

param.name: param_algorithm_min_num_peaks_per_feature
param.label: Minimal number of peaks which are needed for a single feature

param.name: param_algorithm_write_debug_files
param.label: If set to true, for each feature a plot will be created, in the subdirectory 'debug'

param.name: param_algorithm_resample_traces
param.label: If set to true, each trace, which is in this case a part of the MRM monitoring trace with signal is resampled, using the minimal distance of two data points in RT dimension

param.name: param_algorithm_write_debuginfo
param.label: If set to true, debug messages are written, the output can be somewhat lengthy

tool.help:
Detects two-dimensional features in LC-MS data.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_FeatureFinderMRM.html
